title: Vantar Peninga?
text:
Eigum við ekki bara að gera eins og kaninn, skattleggja ólögleg fíkniefni ;)
A $200-a-Gram Tax on Cocaine
“The Spitzer administration projects that the proposal would raise $13 million in the 2008-9 fiscal year and $17 million each year thereafter.”

replies.text: Lögleiða þau bara. betra fyrir alla
